class.name: TileSet
class.description: A TileSet is a library of tiles for a [TileMap]. It contains a list of tiles, each consisting of a sprite and optional collision shapes. Tiles are referenced by a unique integer ID.

method.name: _is_tile_bound
method.description: Determines when the auto-tiler should consider two different auto-tile IDs to be bound together. [b]Note:[/b] [code]neighbor_id[/code] will be [code]-1[/code] ([constant TileMap.INVALID_CELL]) when checking a tile against an empty neighbor tile.

method.name: autotile_clear_bitmask_map
method.description: Clears all bitmask information of the autotile.

method.name: autotile_get_bitmask
method.description: Returns the bitmask of the subtile from an autotile given its coordinates. The value is the sum of the values in [enum AutotileBindings] present in the subtile (e.g. a value of 5 means the bitmask has bindings in both the top left and top right).

method.name: autotile_get_bitmask_mode
method.description: Returns the [enum BitmaskMode] of the autotile.

method.name: autotile_get_icon_coordinate
method.description: Returns the subtile that's being used as an icon in an atlas/autotile given its coordinates. The subtile defined as the icon will be used as a fallback when the atlas/autotile's bitmask information is incomplete. It will also be used to represent it in the TileSet editor.

method.name: autotile_get_light_occluder
method.description: Returns the light occluder of the subtile from an atlas/autotile given its coordinates.

method.name: autotile_get_navigation_polygon
method.description: Returns the navigation polygon of the subtile from an atlas/autotile given its coordinates.

method.name: autotile_get_size
method.description: Returns the size of the subtiles in an atlas/autotile.

method.name: autotile_get_spacing
method.description: Returns the spacing between subtiles of the atlas/autotile.

method.name: autotile_get_subtile_priority
method.description: Returns the priority of the subtile from an autotile given its coordinates. When more than one subtile has the same bitmask value, one of them will be picked randomly for drawing. Its priority will define how often it will be picked.

method.name: autotile_get_z_index
method.description: Returns the drawing index of the subtile from an atlas/autotile given its coordinates.

method.name: autotile_set_bitmask
method.description: Sets the bitmask of the subtile from an autotile given its coordinates. The value is the sum of the values in [enum AutotileBindings] present in the subtile (e.g. a value of 5 means the bitmask has bindings in both the top left and top right).

method.name: autotile_set_bitmask_mode
method.description: Sets the [enum BitmaskMode] of the autotile.

method.name: autotile_set_icon_coordinate
method.description: Sets the subtile that will be used as an icon in an atlas/autotile given its coordinates. The subtile defined as the icon will be used as a fallback when the atlas/autotile's bitmask information is incomplete. It will also be used to represent it in the TileSet editor.

method.name: autotile_set_light_occluder
method.description: Sets the light occluder of the subtile from an atlas/autotile given its coordinates.

method.name: autotile_set_navigation_polygon
method.description: Sets the navigation polygon of the subtile from an atlas/autotile given its coordinates.

method.name: autotile_set_size
method.description: Sets the size of the subtiles in an atlas/autotile.

method.name: autotile_set_spacing
method.description: Sets the spacing between subtiles of the atlas/autotile.

method.name: autotile_set_subtile_priority
method.description: Sets the priority of the subtile from an autotile given its coordinates. When more than one subtile has the same bitmask value, one of them will be picked randomly for drawing. Its priority will define how often it will be picked.

method.name: autotile_set_z_index
method.description: Sets the drawing index of the subtile from an atlas/autotile given its coordinates.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears all tiles.

method.name: create_tile
method.description: Creates a new tile with the given ID.

method.name: find_tile_by_name
method.description: Returns the first tile matching the given name.

method.name: get_last_unused_tile_id
method.description: Returns the ID following the last currently used ID, useful when creating a new tile.

method.name: get_tiles_ids
method.description: Returns an array of all currently used tile IDs.

method.name: remove_tile
method.description: Removes the given tile ID.

method.name: tile_add_shape
method.description: Adds a shape to the tile.

method.name: tile_get_light_occluder
method.description: Returns the tile's light occluder.

method.name: tile_get_material
method.description: Returns the tile's material.

method.name: tile_get_modulate
method.description: Returns the tile's modulation color.

method.name: tile_get_name
method.description: Returns the tile's name.

method.name: tile_get_navigation_polygon
method.description: Returns the navigation polygon of the tile.

method.name: tile_get_navigation_polygon_offset
method.description: Returns the offset of the tile's navigation polygon.

method.name: tile_get_occluder_offset
method.description: Returns the offset of the tile's light occluder.

method.name: tile_get_region
method.description: Returns the tile sub-region in the texture.

method.name: tile_get_shape
method.description: Returns a tile's given shape.

method.name: tile_get_shape_count
method.description: Returns the number of shapes assigned to a tile.

method.name: tile_get_shape_offset
method.description: Returns the offset of a tile's shape.

method.name: tile_get_shape_one_way
method.description: Returns the one-way collision value of a tile's shape.

method.name: tile_get_shape_transform
method.description: Returns the [Transform2D] of a tile's shape.

method.name: tile_get_shapes
method.description: Returns an array of dictionaries describing the tile's shapes. [b]Dictionary structure in the array returned by this method:[/b] [codeblock] { "autotile_coord": Vector2, "one_way": bool, "one_way_margin": int, "shape": CollisionShape2D, "shape_transform": Transform2D, } [/codeblock]

method.name: tile_get_texture
method.description: Returns the tile's texture.

method.name: tile_get_texture_offset
method.description: Returns the texture offset of the tile.

method.name: tile_get_tile_mode
method.description: Returns the tile's [enum TileMode].

method.name: tile_get_z_index
method.description: Returns the tile's Z index (drawing layer).

method.name: tile_set_light_occluder
method.description: Sets a light occluder for the tile.

method.name: tile_set_material
method.description: Sets the tile's material.

method.name: tile_set_modulate
method.description: Sets the tile's modulation color.

method.name: tile_set_name
method.description: Sets the tile's name.

method.name: tile_set_navigation_polygon
method.description: Sets the tile's navigation polygon.

method.name: tile_set_navigation_polygon_offset
method.description: Sets an offset for the tile's navigation polygon.

method.name: tile_set_occluder_offset
method.description: Sets an offset for the tile's light occluder.

method.name: tile_set_region
method.description: Sets the tile's sub-region in the texture. This is common in texture atlases.

method.name: tile_set_shape
method.description: Sets a shape for the tile, enabling collision.

method.name: tile_set_shape_offset
method.description: Sets the offset of a tile's shape.

method.name: tile_set_shape_one_way
method.description: Enables one-way collision on a tile's shape.

method.name: tile_set_shape_transform
method.description: Sets a [Transform2D] on a tile's shape.

method.name: tile_set_shapes
method.description: Sets an array of shapes for the tile, enabling collision.

method.name: tile_set_texture
method.description: Sets the tile's texture.

method.name: tile_set_texture_offset
method.description: Sets the tile's texture offset.

method.name: tile_set_tile_mode
method.description: Sets the tile's [enum TileMode].

method.name: tile_set_z_index
method.description: Sets the tile's drawing index.
